alert.note: Alert for Central Somerset; Southern Somerset (Maine) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 07 at 8:09PM EDT by NWS Gray/Portland
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of south central Somerset County through 845 PM EDT... At 808 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Kingfield, or 19 miles north of Farmington, moving east at 15 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Madison, Bingham, Anson, Embden, New Portland, Concord, Lexington, Moscow, Pleasant Ridge Plantation, Highland Plantation, and Solon. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
